mapper.select: select a.id, a.qu_id quId, q.qu_name quName, q.qu_desc quDesc, a.answer_status answerStatus, a.creater, a.creater_name createrName, a.create_time createTime, a.creater_deptid createrDeptid, a.creater_deptname createrDeptname from answer a left join question q on q.id=a.qu_id order by a.create_time desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
mapper.update: update answer set answer_status = 0 where id = #{id}
